Technical Skills

Languages: Python (Expert), R (Expert), JavaScript, SQL
GIS/Remote Sensing: ArcGIS Pro, QGIS, Google Earth Engine, ENVI
Data Science: Scikit-learn, PyTorch, Xarray, Dask
Field Work: RTK-GPS, Lidar Drone Operations, Bathymetric Surveys

title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in my Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this is a blog for a geographer, expect to see posts about GIS, remote sensing, and spatial analysis here.

title: Software & Packages
text:
I am passionate about building tools that make spatial analysis more accessible. Below are some of the open-source projects I lead or contribute to.


GeoFlow-Py
A high-performance Python library for modeling hydrology in mountainous terrains using distributed computing. GitHub Repo | Docs


CoastalRisk-R
An R package for assessing coastal vulnerability using Bayesian neural networks and historical flood data. CRAN | GitHub


UrbanHeatMapper
A web application for visualizing urban heat islands in real-time using Landsat 8 and Sentinel-2 data. Live Demo | Software Paper
